about_the_game:
Enhance your experience within the Exhale XR app with this VR immersion from the Exhale wellness library.

Experience Details
Sit back and listen as the winds from the bay breeze by. Next enjoy the vast view of the mountaintops as a gentle waterfall accents the mountain sounds behind you. Rested and relaxed by now you will find yourself quietly enjoying an island pond as it slowly reflects the world around.

Purpose
Calming

Length
10:03

Specs
360° video
3840x2160
29.97fps
.mp4 file type

*Disclaimer: “Vast View” & “Restful Ways” purchase options. This one immersion was accidentally put in the wellness library, for purchase, under two different title names. If you already own “Restful Ways” do not purchase “Vast Views” ; these two title names are the exact same experience as seen in the product images. Do not purchase both “Vast View” and “Restful Ways”. We apologize for any inconvenience or confusion caused on behalf of Exhale XR.

name: Exhale XR - Vast View

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5 2nd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidea GTX 1060 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 3rd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVideo GTX 2070 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
